column4: hello, does anyone in here know how to install the 2.6.17-11-generic kernel for use as a bootable kernel when you have ubuntu 7.04 installed?
is there a source to add to sources.lst to allow you to install older kernel images?
why do you want an older kernel?
because some of my hardware, mainly a gps unit won't work with the current kernel, but did on 2.6.17-11-generic
